void CTCLVariable::Update (    ) 
 

Invokes Tcl_UpdateLinkedVar on this variable. Intended to be used if the variable is linked to a C/C++ variable that may be modified by the C/C++ code but traced by Tcl.

Definition at line 645 of file TCLVariable.cpp.

References CTCLInterpreter::getInterpreter(), CTCLInterpreterObject::getInterpreter(), and m_sVariable.
